name: Cerbero 13-40-13 + 2 MgO
description: Cerbero 13-40-13 + 2 MgO is an NPK water-soluble fertilizer for fertirrigation with a high percentage of phosphorus, featuring a very high degree of solubility, purity and the absence of chlorine and sodium. The 1.3.1 NPK ratio makes it particularly suitable for fostering plant rooting and blossoming with consequent production and agricultural yield increases. Cerbero 13-40-13 has an acid pH to prevent scale formation in irrigation systems when these employ hard wat.
